title: Rani Padmavati: Fact and fiction come together in this comic | india-news | Hindustan Times
text:
Rani Padmavati: Fact and fiction come together in this comic india Updated: Feb 21, 2017 14:02 IST Poulomi Banerjee and Mohit Suneja 
Who was Rani Padmavati? Was she a flesh-and-blood queen who heroically committed jauhar - the act of immolating oneself -- rather than fall into the clutches of Alauddin Khilji, a cruel despot? Or do the origins of this story lie in Malik Muhammad Jayasiâ€™s 1540 work of fiction, the Padmavat? 
In our Sunday piece , we dissected the myths, local legends and historical accounts that surround the Rajput queen, whose palace still stands in Chittorgarh. This comic explores the story of Padmavati, or Padmini as she is also known. tags
